recipes.name: Grandma’s Apple Pie
recipes.ingredients: Apples, Flour, Butter, Sugar, Cinnamon
recipes.instructions: Peel and slice apples. Mix with sugar and cinnamon. Roll dough, add filling, bake at 180°C for 45 minutes.

recipes.name: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.ingredients: Spaghetti, Minced Beef, Tomato Sauce, Onion, Garlic
recipes.instructions: Boil spaghetti. Fry beef with onion and garlic. Add tomato sauce. Simmer 20 mins. Serve over spaghetti.

recipes.name: Fluffy Pancakes
recipes.ingredients: Flour, Eggs, Milk, Sugar, Baking Powder
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients. Pour batter on hot pan. Flip when bubbles form. Serve with syrup.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
recipes.ingredients: Bread, Avocado, Lemon Juice, Salt, Pepper
recipes.instructions: Toast bread. Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Spread and enjoy.

recipes.name: Mango Smoothie
recipes.ingredients: Mango, Yogurt, Honey, Ice
recipes.instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve cold.

recipes.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.ingredients: Bread, Butter, Cheese
recipes.instructions: Butter bread, add cheese, and grill until golden brown.

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, Romaine Lettuce, Croutons, Caesar Dressing, Parmesan
recipes.instructions: Grill chicken. Toss lettuce with dressing, top with chicken, croutons, and parmesan.

recipes.name: Tomato Soup
recipes.ingredients: Tomatoes, Onion, Garlic, Basil, Cream
recipes.instructions: Sauté onion and garlic, add tomatoes, simmer, blend and add cream.

recipes.name: Beef Stir Fry
recipes.ingredients: Beef Strips, Soy Sauce, Vegetables, Garlic, Ginger
recipes.instructions: Sauté beef, add garlic and ginger, toss in vegetables, stir fry with soy sauce.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.ingredients: Flour, Butter, Sugar, Eggs, Chocolate Chips
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients, scoop dough onto tray, bake at 180°C for 12 minutes.

recipes.name: French Toast
recipes.ingredients: Bread, Eggs, Milk, Cinnamon, Vanilla
recipes.instructions: Mix eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla. Dip bread and fry until golden.

recipes.name: Greek Salad
recipes.ingredients: Tomatoes, Cucumber, Feta Cheese, Olives, Olive Oil
recipes.instructions: Chop vegetables, add feta and olives, drizzle with olive oil.

recipes.name: Lemon Garlic Salmon
recipes.ingredients: Salmon, Lemon Juice, Garlic, Butter, Parsley
recipes.instructions: Season salmon, pan-sear with garlic and butter, finish with lemon juice.

recipes.name: Veggie Omelette
recipes.ingredients: Eggs, Bell Pepper, Onion, Spinach, Cheese
recipes.instructions: Beat eggs, add vegetables, cook in a pan, top with cheese.

recipes.name: Tuna Pasta
recipes.ingredients: Pasta, Canned Tuna, Mayo, Sweetcorn, Onion
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta, mix with tuna, mayo, sweetcorn, and chopped onion.

recipes.name: Chili Con Carne
recipes.ingredients: Minced Beef, Beans, Chili Powder, Onion, Tomato
recipes.instructions: Cook beef and onions, add tomatoes, beans, and spices. Simmer for 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Garlic Butter Shrimp
recipes.ingredients: Shrimp, Garlic, Butter, Lemon Juice, Parsley
recipes.instructions: Cook shrimp in garlic butter, finish with lemon juice and parsley.

recipes.name: Quinoa Bowl
recipes.ingredients: Quinoa, Chickpeas, Avocado, Cucumber, Dressing
recipes.instructions: Cook quinoa. Combine all ingredients in a bowl and drizzle with dressing.

recipes.name: BBQ Chicken Wings
recipes.ingredients: Chicken Wings, BBQ Sauce, Salt, Pepper
recipes.instructions: Season wings, bake until crispy, coat in BBQ sauce and bake again.

recipes.name: Mashed Potatoes
recipes.ingredients: Potatoes, Butter, Milk, Salt
recipes.instructions: Boil potatoes, mash with butter and milk, season to taste.

recipes.name: Egg Fried Rice
recipes.ingredients: Rice, Eggs, Peas, Carrots, Soy Sauce
recipes.instructions: Scramble eggs, add rice and vegetables, stir fry with soy sauce.

recipes.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.ingredients: Bell Peppers, Rice, Ground Beef, Tomato Sauce, Cheese
recipes.instructions: Stuff peppers with mixture, top with cheese, and bake.

recipes.name: Banana Bread
recipes.ingredients: Bananas, Flour, Eggs, Sugar, Baking Soda
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients and bake at 180°C for 1 hour.

recipes.name: Shrimp Tacos
recipes.ingredients: Shrimp, Tortillas, Cabbage, Lime, Sour Cream
recipes.instructions: Cook shrimp, assemble with toppings in tortillas.

recipes.name: Coconut Rice
recipes.ingredients: Rice, Coconut Milk, Salt
recipes.instructions: Cook rice in coconut milk and a pinch of salt until fluffy.

recipes.name: Zucchini Noodles
recipes.ingredients: Zucchini, Olive Oil, Garlic, Parmesan
recipes.instructions: Spiralize zucchini, sauté with garlic, finish with cheese.
